description: Curr Sedd Glasses are the glasses that let the wearer see through all the world`s truths clearly and distinctly, all of nature and creation. They were given to http://anidb.net/ch1163 [Shinpachi] by the http://anidb.net/ch96904 [owner of a certain glasses store] as a temporary replacement for his broken ones.
name: Norowa Retaa Megane
